entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
